Header: What should I replace Optifine with
Content: Optifine should be replaced with rubidium, since unlike Optifine, rubidium is open source.
You shouldn't use Optifine, it's closed soured nature prevents us from making compat for it.
You can't download Clockwork as it's currently in a closed alpha, testers are selected by the devs. And no, constantly asking doesn't help you become a tester.
Clockwork is currently in a closed alpha, it'll be released to the public anywhere from 2-4 weeks.
If you are using Optifine, then delete it. Else make sure that you're using the latest version of the mod
You can download takeoff using this video: 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BEocRbmM9Co&ab_channel=Rango'
Are you sure you have all the depedencies you need? For example the forge version requires the Kotlin mod to be installed
